update sctrans.T_TS_SUP set FIN_ORG_CODE = #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, SUP_CAT = #{supCat,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, REL_FIN_ORG_CODE = #{relFinOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_LEVEL=#{coLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
